ticket.title: ActiveSupport::Inflector#ordinalize not I18n-enabled
ticket.original-body:
I've made ordinalize I18n-ready by monkey-patching it. I'm willing to turn it into a patch against ActiveSupport, but I'm not sure my approach is the right one, so I'm willing to discuss it ;-).
activesupport_ordinalize.rb is the monkey-patch. fr_ordinalize.yml contains the rules for French.
For reference (I've found those just now, so my current implementation doesn't handle those cases) : http://art.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1549724 http://typophile.com/node/42577
Right now this approach works in languages where the ordinals don't depend on gender.
